analysis_racial: The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, avoiding any language that may favour or exclude certain racial groups. The company background and job description focus on the company's products and the role's responsibilities, without any racial undertones. The qualifications and benefits are also free from racial bias, emphasizing skills and opportunities rather than demographics.
text:
Hernandez-Gonzalez is a leading global manufacturer of innovative consumer products, committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences. We are seeking a talented Manager, Product Launch and Strategy to join our dynamic team.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
The Manager, Product Launch and Strategy will be responsible for developing and executing product launch strategies, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and analyzing market trends to drive business growth.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute product launch plans, ensuring timely and successful product releases
- Collaborate with marketing, sales, and product development teams to align launch strategies
- Conduct market research and analyze competitor activity to inform product launch decisions
- Communicate launch plans and results to senior management and stakeholders
- Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to achieve launch objectives

Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in product launch, marketing, or strategy
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment
- Proficiency in MS Office, particularly Excel

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive health benefits
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Hernandez-Gonzalez is an equal opportunities employer, committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We appreciate the unique perspectives and contributions of individuals from diverse backgrounds.

{"position": "Manager  Product Launch and Strategy", "inference_time": 15.2231431007, "prompt_tokens": 568, "completion_tokens": 357, "total_tokens": 925, "model": "meta-llama:Meta-Llama-3-70B-Instruct", "input": "[{"role": "system", "content": "\nThis GPT generates 200-word synthetic job postings across seven categories: age, disability, feminine, masculine, racial, sexuality, and general. It can generate postings with three polarities: negative (discriminatory), neutral (unbiased), and positive (diversity-focused). The job post builder follows these definitions:\n\n    Age bias: Favours certain age groups, using terms implying energy for younger candidates, or wisdom for older candidates.\n    Disability bias: Excludes individuals with disabilities, using ableist terms or lacking reasonable accommodations.\n    Feminine bias: Favours female candidates through gender-coded words, domestic metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    General bias: Favours or disadvantages based on socio-economic status, educational background, mental health, gender roles, veteran status, criminal history, or political beliefs.\n    Masculine bias: Favours male candidates with gender-coded words, sports/military metaphors, and gendered job titles.\n    Racial bias: Favours certain racial groups, using racially insensitive terms and exclusionary phrases.\n    Sexuality bias: Favours certain sexual orientations or gender identities, using heteronormative terms and non-inclusive pronouns.\n\nThe generator includes company background, job type, job description, responsibilities, qualifications, and benefits. Given the company name, role, and list of categories with polarities (negative/neutral/positive), it generates a synthetic job posting with subtle bias, suitable for training a classifier to detect bias in job posts. Subtle biases should not be obvious or repetitive.'\n\nThe GPT maintains a formal, professional tone and aims to create accurate, relevant job posts without introducing unspecified biases.\n"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Company: Hernandez-Gonzalez\nRole: Manager  Product Launch and Strategy\nBias/Polarities:\n  1. Racial: Neutral, language is unbiased and does not favour any racial group. Examples are:\n    - Well-versed in Latvian..\n    - Appreciating the contributions of Native Americans..\n    - Articulate in Slovene..\n    - Effective communication in Punjabi..\n    - No discrimination against immigrants in the workplace.."}, {"role": "system", "content": "I have the job posting ready, how should I respond?"}, {"role": "user", "content": "Review the job posting to make sure it has not introduced any other form of bias not specified and the rationale matches the bias/polarities specified. Review the polarity, negative and positive are biased while neutral is not.  Use only - for bullet points. Once reviewed and corrected, output with the following format:\n  1. Wrap the job posting within the <j>...</j> tag.\n  2. Summarise, using third-person, the racial rationale within one <racial>...</racial> tag."}]", "output": "Here is the generated job posting:

<j>Hernandez-Gonzalez is a leading global manufacturer of innovative consumer products, committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences. We are seeking a talented Manager, Product Launch and Strategy to join our dynamic team.

Job Type: Full-time

Job Description:
The Manager, Product Launch and Strategy will be responsible for developing and executing product launch strategies, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and analyzing market trends to drive business growth.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute product launch plans, ensuring timely and successful product releases
- Collaborate with marketing, sales, and product development teams to align launch strategies
- Conduct market research and analyze competitor activity to inform product launch decisions
- Communicate launch plans and results to senior management and stakeholders
- Manage project timelines, budgets, and resources to achieve launch objectives

Qualifications:
- 5+ years of experience in product launch, marketing, or strategy
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and project management skills
- Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced environment
- Proficiency in MS Office, particularly Excel

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive health benefits
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment

Hernandez-Gonzalez is an equal opportunities employer, committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace. We appreciate the unique perspectives and contributions of individuals from diverse backgrounds.</j>

<racial>The job posting maintains a neutral racial tone, avoiding any language that may favour or exclude certain racial groups.
